content: The Gray Wolf Mask is obtained upon defeating Lingxuzi in Forest of Wolves in Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain. This is a mandatory boss. Like the other unique gear pieces, this armor can't be crafted.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gray_Wolf_Mask.md', within the main section titled 'Gray Wolf Mask'.
The content is as follows:
The Gray Wolf Mask is obtained upon defeating Lingxuzi in Forest of Wolves in Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain. This is a mandatory boss. Like the other unique gear pieces, this armor can't be crafted.
